sentences.english: His team pulled 10 bodies out of Beichuan'shigh school Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 日本救援队周日在北川中学挖掘出10具尸体。

sentences.english: People in Port-au-Prince watch as a French rescue team searches for a survivor.
sentences.chinese: 在太子港人们在看着法国救援队搜寻一名生还者。

sentences.english: 'We'll figure out a solution, ' said Chen Yongsheng, the leader of one of the rescue teams.
sentences.chinese: 救援队队长陈永生说，会找出解决的办法。

sentences.english: Joplin's disaster teams have performed phenomenally and efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 乔普林灾难救援队表现出色而高效。

sentences.english: About 60 rescuers from the CEA left Beijing for Qinghai this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 中国地震救援队60人今天下午从北京飞往震区。

sentences.english: The medicine rescue team was established on the military-civilian combination.
sentences.chinese: 采用军地融合的方式，联合组建医学救援队。

sentences.english: The Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA) sends emergency relief to Africa.
sentences.chinese: 日本国际协力事业团派紧急救援队到非洲。

sentences.english: Also on the page are photos of Wen with international rescuers and helpers.
sentences.chinese: 页面上也有温总理和国际救援队的照片。

sentences.english: China has accepted Japan's offer to send an emergency response team to the quake-stricken areas.
sentences.chinese: 此外，中国同意日本派出紧急救援队前往灾区。

sentences.english: Sixty-five hours later, a French rescue team saved him.
sentences.chinese: 在65小时以后，一个法国救援队把他救出。

definition: to dispatch police to the scene of crime, accident etc
